info.name: DS - YouTube Fixed Position Player
info.description:
DS - YouTube Fixed Position Player
  • Keeps YouTube player fixed at the top, allowing you to scroll to see suggested videos, comments, sharing and embed forms, etc while still seeing the video
  • You can select on which modes (default, theater or both) you want (see notes below)
Suggestions? Send me a message.
info.additionalInfo:
Tip: with "all modes" enabled during installation you can easily disable the script on Userstyle with 2 clicks (click Stylish icon on your browser, then click "DS - YouTube Fixed Position Player"). If you choose to fix the player only in a specific mode you won't be able to enable it so easily (will need to come back here and re-install). So test with "all modes" first and then re-install only if you are sure you want it enabled for only one mode. Changelog 2018-05-29
  • Updated to work on new Youtube layout
